publisher.value: Health Level Seven Australia (Orders and Observations WG)

description.value: This identifier profile defines a local report order identifier in an Australian context. A local report identifier is a unique identifier for each report and must uniquely identify the report from all other reports in a particular system (e.g. diagnostic imaging system, clinical laboratory system, document management system, referral systems).

copyright.value: HL7 AustraliaÂ© 2018+; Licensed Under Creative Commons No Rights Reserved.

definition.value: Local report identifier assigned by an organisation to a report in that organisation's set of reports. A local report identifier is a unique identifier for each report and must uniquely identify the report from all other reports in a particular system (e.g. diagnostic imaging system, clinical laboratory system, document management system, referral systems).

short.value: Coded identifier type for local report identifier
System identifier namespace for the organisation that assigned the report identifier
Organisation that assigned the report identifier
